# Preface

This is a repository for dataset, figures, and R Notebook with the R codes for our paper titled *Quantitative Distribution of English and Indonesian Motion Verbs and Its Typological Implications: A case study with the English and Indonesian versions of the* Twilight *novel*. This paper is accepted for publication with minor revisions in the *[Journal of Language and Literature](https://e-journal.usd.ac.id/index.php/JOLL/index)*.
